>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.hIhgdXnqGHBm0A64]{Envoy Improvisation}

@Icon[type:language-dependent] @Icon[type:mind-affecting] @Icon[type:sense-dependent]

When you make a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.d4fcGwOcrsuYrwGH]{Medicine} check to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.d4fcGwOcrsuYrwGH#treat-deadly-wounds]{Treat Deadly Wounds} or successfully @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.HWJ570MVgFoO5Reb#aid-another]{Aid Another} for another creature’s Medicine check to treat deadly wounds, if the Medicine check is successful you can add your Charisma bonus to the number of Hit Points recovered as a result of the skill check. Additionally, when you make a Medicine check to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.d4fcGwOcrsuYrwGH#treat-disease]{Treat Disease} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.d4fcGwOcrsuYrwGH#treat-drugs-or-poison]{Treat Drugs or Poison}, or successfully aid another for another creature’s Medicine check to do so, if the Medicine check is successful, the saving throw bonus granted by the skill checks increases to +6. If the associated saving throw succeeds, it counts as two consecutive successes for the purposes of curing the intended affliction.
